Compare ROC curves using bootstrap method

Source: R/meddecide-utils.R
bootstrap_roc_test.Rd

Compare ROC curves using bootstrap method

Usage

bootstrap_roc_test(test_data, n_bootstrap = 1000)

Arguments

test_data

List of test results

n_bootstrap

Number of bootstrap iterations

Value

A list containing bootstrap comparison results:

overall

Overall comparison results using Friedman test

pairwise

Matrix of pairwise comparison p-values
